Payments made via PayPal Express Checkout.

• Product Catalog 2.0: The invoice is yet to be closed (sent for payment collection). An invoice is generated with this status when it has line items that belong to items that are metered or when the subscription.create_pending_invoices attribute is set to true.
  • Product Catalog 1.0: The invoice is yet to be closed (sent for payment collection). All invoices are generated with this status when Metered Billing is enabled for the site.
